Review.Titre: Eagle Saver blaming ME for THEIR error!
Review.Contenu: Looks like the company has really let us down this time. They are claiming that I entered UPCs for vinyl and then sent CDs to them. While I DID enter the CORRECT UPC number from the CD packaging, the DESCRIPTION on the packing list shows an incorrect UPC number with a correct description mentioning "CD." Because of their error, my order was held up for two weeks and now they claim that it's MY FAULT for sending CDs, instead of vinyl and are shorting me on what they originally offered for the CD title, according to an email I received from them.Worse, I have sent two emails showing their error and neither one has been answered.Because I have one more order which they have received on 2/20 (but still have not acknowledged three days later) which has the same CD title, this will most likely happen AGAIN, due to their data-entry error. And, again, I will probably be blamed and my payout will be reduced.What a reasonably-run company would do is to apologize for their error and immediately forward the money I am owed for what was originally offered (maybe with a "good will" extra credit), when I sold the CDs to them. Of course, good luck with that...

Review.Titre: Horrible Company that says one thing but does another
Review.Contenu: I read all the positive reviews online and was excited to send in my first items. I boxed up 5 boxes full of my family's items and sent them to Eagle Saver. When they received them they said that there were many of them that did not meet their minimum condition standards. On their homepage they state that they will return any items that they won't buy free of charge. When I asked for the items back they refused. It didn't matter to them that their homepage said they would send the items back for free they still refused. They refused to stand behind what they put on their own website! I even went so far as to send them a screen shot of what they have up and they didn't care. They said it would cost them too much so they weren't going to keep their word.

I sent 5 blue rays in and they wrote back that they only received 4.  They then went on to tell me that the movies I listed were different than the ones that I sent.  I know that next time I will take a picture to show proof that they were indeed the correct movies.  The whole thing just seems sketchy and dishonest.  I do not recommend and will definitely not be selling anything to EagleSaver again in the future.UPDATE after their reply: I keep my single star because I know for a fact that I entered the bar codes EXACTLY as they appeared.  On top of that, the fact that one was "missing" shows how unorganized and unprofessional they are.  One obviously got lost and they tried to put the blame on me.  Make sure you take pictures of everything you send as proof so the same thing doesn't happen to you.

It feels manipulative and fraudulent. i will never work with Eagle Saver again.

Review.Titre: Lack of communication/ difficult to get error corrected
Review.Contenu: Final Update-After getting my second response from the BBB 10 days ago, Eagle Saver did finally send me payment via paypal today.Update- The company never emailed or called me back. So, I had to file a BBB complaint. Their response ignored the error that they had originally promised to look into, and just said that they could not accept without the book. They really did not answer my complaint or question. It has been a week since I responded to the company's response. I wish the company would have just communicate with me either way in the beginning, because by them ignoring me I am out my blu ray set and the quoted price. Original review-This is the second time that I used them. The first time went smoothly, but beware when they make an error it feels like they are not going to correct. They e-mailed me late last  Wednesday that they couldn't accept my Blu-Ray for Cinderella, since the book from the set was missing. I e-mailed them back right away that this was an error, because the book is attached and actually a part of the Blu-Ray case. I think that the person checking them must have not noticed since the pages were crisp and new (I never used the book part).I received an e-mailed Thursday morning from them, saying that they would look into it and get back to me shortly. After waiting to hear something all day Friday, I e-mailed again to see how correcting the error was going. By midday Monday, I tried calling since still not hearing from them after Thurday morning. I left a voicemail, since there is no way to get a hold of a person on the phone.I am worried that they will give away the Blu-Ray away before they get around to looking into it. I don't really want them to just send the Blu-Ray set back, since I cannot be sure it will come back in the same condition that I sent it, since the case is cardboard. I made sure to package it special.If there is an error on their part, you do not get your quoted price the next day as advertised. I am still waiting to see if you get it back at all.

Review.Contenu: I’d give them 3.5 stars if I could. I appreciate the fact that they send back unwanted items. I have, however, received items back with the reason listed as “heavy damage”, yet upon inspection they are pretty much flawless. Communication is lacking. Don’t bother calling, even though the website says to call regarding questions, you’ll never get an answer or response. Time for turn over from sending, delivery and payment is good.  The 1st 2 times I sent items they accepted them all. The following 2 times they sent 1/2 of them back. The quality of items didn’t change, therefore I’m not sure the reason for the refusal. Their scanner is basically useless, and you’ll need to spend a lot of time punching in all of the numbers. Many of their upc codes are wrong, and when you contact them or send in the correct upc code, they disregard the information, even though the website tells you to contact them if the upc is coming up wrong?!? Not sure why the quality of the scanner is to poor. I utilize other sell back apps and they have awesome scanners. Overall, not a bad site, and to reiterate… I do appreciate the company sending the items back. I have disregarded other sites due to the lack of this service. Not a perfect system, but not horrible either.

This is an update to my previous review when I could not get an update to my order that was delivered after emailing and calling. My order sat for 6 days after delivery. I tried to email requesting an update twice and I called and left 2 voicemails because no one was ever available to take a call. I was afraid that I was going to get ripped off of 72 brand new DVDs. I finally left a 1 star review on Monday 2/13 and low and behold the next day I get an email that my order has arrived and is being processed. I feel you need to update your website from stating that your order will be processed when delivered and payment within the next 24 hours because that is not my experience. My order sat there since 2/8 with FedEx delivery proof and didn't get processed until 2/14. There was no contact from customer service. As stated above no replies to my numerous emails or phone call inquires. With so many scams out there just be transparent with your process. EagleSaver did accept more DVDs than DeCluttr and at better pricing and the process was very easy. The reason for the 3 stars is for the lack of customer service and the stress I felt for thinking I was being scammed.

Review.Contenu: The company did purchase all of the movies that they said they would, and for the amount of money that they said they would.  I received the check in a timely manner.  My biggest issue is with the app!  It takes too long for the scanner to scan the UPC, then it takes too long for it to find the movie and list the purchase price.  There were a lot of UPC codes that I had to type in because the scanner couldn't read them (but a competitor's app read them just fine).  Sometimes the app couldn't find the movie based on the UPC.  And worst yet, I went through and scanned around 100 items.  When I hit continue they ALL DISAPPEARED!  I had to re-scan...!!!

Review.Titre: I didn't like that I keep
Review.Contenu: I didn't like that I keep. I had to keep calling and leaving voice messages. And nobody called me back. I didn't like to pack that. They said they were open from 8:08 AM to 5 PM Pacific. I called 2 or 3 times or more. I still there was nobody available. I got voice message after voice message, I left message. I'll be there in 5 minui. Said you have to message nobody called me back.  I almost had to open a FedEx case case. I do like to pack that they did pay for the people of customer service. I will pray for customer service. I will pray for Thair message system. Thank you and God bless.

Review.Titre: I really don't like that prices change…
Review.Contenu: I really don't like that prices change from when you send it in and they receive it. You should honor what you quoted. Also several blu-rays were "missing a disc", yet I checked every one of them before I shipped.

Review.Titre: Over two weeks after shipping the box…
Review.Contenu: Over two weeks after shipping the box and no contact. Didn't know what happened until I e-mailed. You should have at least contacted me first to explain the delay.

Review.Titre: The process was easy enough but what…
Review.Contenu: The process was easy enough but what you offer in purchasing is VERY minimal

Review.Titre: haven't received an answer to my question
Review.Contenu: I emailed to find out where my payment was since I had sent it out late.  I haven't heard back and have confirmed that the return dvds did arrive and were signed for.

This was my first time using this kind of service. They have very good reviews and I had a bunch of brand new DVDs that I didn't know what to do with until I found this site. I spent 2 hours keying the 100+ DVDs I had into their system to get a quote and EagleSaver ended up wanting 72 of them. Yay, so I thought. The process was super simple up until my package was delivered to them. Package was delivered on Wednesday 2/8/23 and the website says that you will be paid the next day well here we are 5 days after my package was delivered and my account says still waiting on shipment. I sent an email to them on Friday 2/11 to check on an update and sent them the FedEx delivery confirmation as well, did not hear back. I tried to call them later Friday evening but their hours are 8-5 Pacific time which is strange because the package was delivered to Florida. So needless to say the I did not hear back. Here we are Monday evening and 2 emails later no response and no update to my account. I also called, no one available to take my call leave a message, I did. Here we are at 6 PM on Monday and still have not heard from them. I called them again and pushed 2 instead of 1 hoping to get someone on the phone and again no one available to take my call, leave a message. Now I will be hitting 6 days past my package was delivered to them, 2 emails and 2 phone messages and I still have no update. I am out 72 brand new DVDs and no funds as promised on their site. Just beware. I know some reviews are good and some are not this has just been my experience with them. If they contact me or fulfill their end of the deal I will update but as of right now I don't have much faith in that considering the website says you will be paid the day after delivery and here we are 5 days later and I cannot even get someone to email or talk to me.2/15/23 Edit - My order was processed on 2/14 and I did leave another review. Like I said in that review. With all the scams going on nowadays just be transparent or have someone in customer service available to answer customers concerns. Had I been notified that they were behind schedule the process would have not have been stressful at all. It was really easy to navigate their site and print labels and their prices beat DeCluttr and they also took more DVDs than them too. I will be using EagleSaver again. and recommending should someone need this kind of service. Updating from 1 star to 3 just due to the lack of customer service.

Review.Titre: A little slow on responding but finally…
Review.Contenu: A little slow on responding but finally did a few days after.... All in all you paid me...

Review.Titre: A decent solution to my clutter problem.
Review.Contenu: I have used this company a few times to sell unwanted clutter. It was difficult to effectively communicate with them about my most recent shipment of DVDs - I had to contact them multiple times about it, their responses to my issue were short and a bit vague, and they don't really answer their phone. I would probably do business with them again, however. I would say I'm satisfied, but they could definitely do better.

Review.Titre: I was very skeptical of this website…
Review.Contenu: I was very skeptical of this website and while the transaction OVERALL was okay, it was filled with multiple delays, days and days of silence, unreturned emails and phone calls, and capped off with a claim that they didn't receive one of the items that I know was in the box.  While I did get paid part of what they offered, it was a massive hassle and I would not do it again.

Review.Titre: OK - good if you're just looking to declutter
Review.Contenu: Service for the most part was good.  Was disappointed with the ridiculously low prices offered for some DVD sets that I was offering, but my main goal was decluttering so I still went ahead.  Did not expect to get a note that some of these were deemed "too used" and I could have them sent back or they would just give them to charity.  Seemed pretty petty since the 8 sets (of the 30-40 I sent) amount to about $3 total.
I did t. Like it showed.the full price.and still didn't get half

They reject too many titles. They only respond by email so when they don't respond you wonder when they're going to. They are cheap and don't pay what what the dvds, cds and games are worth. Out of hundreds of books hardback and paperback, I have never successfully sold EagleSaver a book of any kind. I think they're lying when they say they buy books because it is impossible to sell books to them.

Review.Titre: Frustrating but they paid what they promised
Review.Contenu: They paid what they promised. I almost didn't send anything in because of the 20 dollar minimum. Its pretty hard to get to $20 when you offer 35 cents or less for most things. For 35 cents I might as well just keep the games. I really only wanted to sell one game but had to sell several to get to the 20 dollar minimum.  I found the experience frustrating and slightly insulting

Review.Titre: Web site was easy to use and process…
Review.Contenu: Web site was easy to use and process was just as stated.  My only disappointment was that I had some movies that did not have a UPC on them so I looked them up on the internet and got a UPC but Eaglesaver wouldn't take them.  Not really sure why.  Other than that it worked great and I had a check and my returned DVDS in under 2 weeks.

Review.Titre: My order had been received several days…
Review.Contenu: My order had been received several days before I sent in an email about the status of my order.  Upon receiving my emails, the wheels began to turn and I did get $ sent via PayPal for my CDs.  Sometimes it pays to be a squeaky wheel.

Horrible communication! No notifications of any kind were sent at any point except in response to emails I sent asking what was taking so long. They had my package for 3 days but it was still showing as "awaiting delivery", so I emailed to find out what the delay was. Then I had to ask twice when my rejected item was going to be returned - that took a month! Entire transaction from start to finish took 6 weeks - definitely not what it says on their website.

Didn’t send all the rejected DVDs back at first but they found them and sent them.Update. It’s 20 days later and I’ve yet to receive my DVDs back. The tracking number states that they were brought to the post office and they’ve been sitting there for 20 days waiting to be accepted by the USPS. Doesn’t make any sense at all.

Review.Titre: I did not read through all the…
Review.Contenu: I did not read through all the instructions before creating my quote.  And I do understand that some of the items would not be accepted.  The reasoning for the items that were rejected was excess wear.  80% of the items returned do not fit that description.  I am glad that I was able to sell most of my items.  But I would not recommend or use the service again.

Review.Titre: As long as you can wait for a check to mail
Review.Contenu: Have used several times. Once they receive your box they'll  issue a check quickly -but then you wait on USPS for payment check (your ONLY CHOICE). Their claim of an option to have direct PayPal payment is false. They claim to offer Paypal direct payment YET NEVER accept your Paypal email address (my PP account has been in use for well over a decade, no excuses) so I am forced to wait for the check and hope the USPS doesn't lose it.*After their automated reply*THEIR website will not allow you to imput your Paypal email, there is no issue with Paypal's website

Process was straightforward. Only about 30% of my DVDs were accepted, which is understandable because not all DVDs are in demand. Keep in mind you have to hit a certain minimum amount for the order to be accepted; I forgot the amount but the average buy back price of the DVD had to hit a certain amount, otherwise you have to remove the lowest cost DVDs to hit this number. This was not communicated beforehand. I got my money shortly after the DVDs were accepted. The phone app is a bit clumsy.

Review.Titre: Overall I appreciate the service you…
Review.Contenu: Overall I appreciate the service you offer.  On a negative note, I get tired of having perfectly acceptable wear/tear rejected once the items are received.  I assume you use that canned answer for anything you just decide you don't want after receiving the shipment.  I know I have sent items that have never been used more than one time and were kept in their cases rejected for excessive use/scratches.  When I ship off my items I have an expectation that they are in good shape, cases are not broken and the money I've been quoted will be paid.  This doesn't happen and is frustrating.

Review.Titre: They have a very limited library...
Review.Contenu: They have a very limited library of items they take compared to competitors. On the plus side they have an app and the ease of a scanner. Prices are comparable to other sites as well and they cover shipping costs. They process items quickly and accepted items without incident. Payment was made promptly. Not my first choice just based on the limitations, but trustworthy.

Told us that they did not want some 10 dvd's on June 16th and asked us if we wanted them back or donated.  We requested them to be returned to us the next day well within the 5 day period for responding. Nothing happened for 2 weeks or more and we had to inquire as to where the dvd's were.  They apologized, found the dvd's and returned them to us July 12th.Mix up somewhere but ended well.  We will still do business with them in the future.

Review.Titre: I'd rather do business somewhere else.
Review.Contenu: It's really a crapshoot as to what they will take. Sometimes they reject near mint books and I can't figure it out. I'd be more upset about it, but they do return the rejected materials for free so there's that. EagleSaver is definitely not my first choice when selling old books and media.

Review.Titre: They have for the most part been good …
Review.Contenu: They have for the most part been good although they provided a quote for a movie then when they received it did not honor their quoted price saying the dvd was not one they would take even though they had quoted a price in their system. The dvd was a new release with a quote of over $5. Just wondering if they didn't want to pay out the quoted price.

I just wanted to comment how easy it is to use and profit from EagleSaver but my only issue was and still is a still unsolved password problem.  Every-time I attempt a login I am prompted my password is incorrect but it isn't.  I have reset my password numerous times with no remedy and have contacted customer service but the issue is still not fixed.  Other than the password issue I would give EagleSaver 5 stars...

I had over 150 DVDs to sell but couldn't sell them because EagleSaver requires the average price to be a dollar. Which is idiotic since they are only able to offer a few at the required price. I was only able to sell them a few when they could have gotten over 150. That is bad to not be able to make it easy for your customers to sell back anything to them.

Review.Titre: Was paid for what I spent but they…
Review.Contenu: Was paid for what I sent in but they weren’t clear about wanting a minimum of $1 per item on average until I tried to submit and that made it a frustrating experience as I had to part with some items I wasn’t ready to yet. I couldn’t sell a lot of the items I wanted to because they were below 50 cents and I had over 100 additional items I wanted to sell that they could accept that other places won’t but couldn’t without dragging the value down. Giving 3 stars for being paid what I was promised but wouldn’t recommend if you are looking to offload media.

Order was processed rapidly and check emitted. However, 4 of submitted products were rejected using puzzling criteria -- a problem of "subject content" in spite of the product being accepted at input. Telephone contact was made for clarifications, a message was left, but no follow-up occurred.

Only had one issue with a dvd I bought off Amazon. I was told it wouldn't be bought because the discs were copies. Considering I bought it new off Amazon directly, the discs certainly weren't burned discs. The employees don't always do a good job and know what they're doing. Sold it no problem to a similar site.

Very easy to work with, shipping and payment process was simple, and EagleSaver bought CDs that others would not, but still the payout is very low.  Still, I was able to clean out my old CDs and got slightly more back on them than I would donating them all to Goodwill.

Review.Titre: Not up to their previous standards ...
Review.Contenu: I understand that COVID-19 has made it more difficult to do business. Nonetheless, I must say that I'm truly disappointed in my recent experiences with EagleSaver. They have not lived up to their commitment to pay "within1 business day of receipt." Further, all calls regarding existing orders go immediately to VM, and they have not lived up to their commitment to respond to email/VM queries "within 24 business hours." Payment has been very slow, and I'm still waiting for them to acknowledge receipt of my most recent shipment, which was delivered Tuesday.

Process was easy, prices were better than other sites. Only complaint is that several CDs that I know were in the box were listed as missing, including one you committed to paying $37 for. So it feels like you  just stole this multi-cd package from me

Well I was happy to find a place that would purchase my books but I was very dissapointed in the amounts that are offered for them. And I have a whole closet of books to sell but Eaglesaver only bought a quarter of what i wanted to sell. So i still have a bunch of books im stuck with. I will not be using Eaglesaver again.

The first time I used EagleSaver it was good.  Second time I had questions because of rejections on the most expensive of the DVD's.  I had Series 1,2,3 which I purchased from different amazon sellers all 3 were rejected for different reasons by EagleSaver.  Which I found strange I lost almost $20 from that.

Review.Titre: I wished you all would offer more for…
Review.Contenu: I wished you all would offer more for all the movies, especially ones that aren't even opened. I think for someone to pay $19.95 per movie and only receive $.12 is a little ridiculous and your company will turn around and sell it for $10.99 or $19.95.

Eaglesaver decided that the most expensive book I delivered to them was not in good condition.  Moisture stains?  No.  This book was the best of the lot.  As per their policies, I asked that the book be returned to me.  They have failed to do so, and that makes their motives suspect.

Up until the point of receiving a check for the items sent in, all was well. No complaints whatsoever- Quick, effortless, and convenient! However, the amount of the check received was a third of what the projected amount was to be. A third of the amount I was shown when I input the items I was going to send in. I understand the concept of estimates, but I feel that the customer should receive a slip explaining what was purchased and for what amount. Perhaps even an e-mail explaining the conditions that weren't met or whatnot.

I would give 5 stars, but one on one communication with them seems to be missing. It seems like any time you call in with a question you get there machine. The machine says all calls will be answered within 24 hours- not true, please don't shoot the messenger.

No communication whatsoever. Had to email them 3 days after they received my shipment to find out what was going on and never received a reply. "Surprisingly" the order was completed not longer after I sent the email. Seem to make up their own rules when it comes to items. Told me one item was essentially pirated when it was purchased at our local Target and the UPC matches to it perfectly. It is what it is. Lack of communication will keep me from using their service again. I will say getting paid was very quick and easy just would have like someone to answer me..seems like a lot of reviews talk about their lack of transparency.
It was not worth it. I entered approximately 150 CDs and they ended up buying only about 50 of them for a total of $20. The only positive was the free shipping and fast payment to PayPal.

Review.Titre: Good for DVDs.  Squat for books.
Review.Contenu: Pretty pleased with the acceptance rate of DVDs, quotes offered, free shipping and the quick turnaround in pay.  Not impressed with the acceptance rate for books.  I have entered at least 100 book ISBNs and only received a quote for one.

Review.Titre: Intuitive process. Prompt response. Questionable minimum requirements.
Review.Contenu: Their website (though dated looking) worked quite well, and they offered many items that other websites would not accept. The process (including shipping) was easy and intuitive, and the assessment and payment of the order was extremely prompt.Really the only complaint -- and it is kinda substantial, imo-- was the minimum requirements for the order:  "The order value of items actually shipped must be $20.00 or greater and the minimum average value per an item shipped must be $1.00 or greater."Most websites require something like $10 minimum at $0.75 per item, which seems much more reasonable.

They did not accept all the DVDs ,Said I had to request them back in five days or they would DONATE TO CHERITY ,I requested them back by e-mail have not heard any thing back . BUT THAT SAID they sent the check on the ones they accepted very fast , SO Make sure you check your DVDs and CDs and make sure there in PERFICT shape, They may look good to you but they want them perfect. In Response to your reply I did contact you at the e-mail address you said to and put order number and said ship items back you did not accept , I feel that if you don't accept something you should just ship back . I am not questioning the Companies HONESTY Just saying wont use again

Only accepted half my order based off the reason they weren't accepting that item. Why give me a quote for it? Also its taking forever to get my items returned. My first experience could have been much better
I like EagleSaver.com. They are honest and process your order quickly.I don't like that they keep changing the average amount of the items submitted. It was .50, .75 and now it is a dollar.

My experience overall was sufficient. However I found another site that offered more money for the dvd's. Eaglesaver was reasonable. Nevertheless, their prices I don't believe were fair compared to another site I went to. One thing that was extremely positive was the fact they paid for shipping and allowed you to print out a fedex shipping label. Another problem I had was the fact that the site I sold most of my DVD's to had bulk pricing which made the transaction go easier. Where Eaglesaver does not offer Bulk and I had to individually place each upc number in and press enter. To make the shopping experience better I suggest offering a little more for DVD's and offer Bulk pricing like most of your competitors.

Review.Titre: Quick response but a lot of requirements
Review.Contenu: I had many more DVDs to trade in, but the requirements for more than $20 and an average of $1 per trade-in item meant that I couldn't trade all of them in. That was a little frustrating.

Review.Titre: Okay, not sure why items were returned
Review.Contenu: I received $100 less credit and they returned some of the items for "disc has heavy surface wear". I don't understand that as there's no water damage, nor rips/tears.

Review.Titre: I bought here my phone for college .But…
Review.Contenu: I bought here my phone for college .But honestly I bought not so cheap and the first breakdown I got in 5 months .  They fixed it so thank u

i like eaglesaver because they give more money than the other websites...but twice now I've had an order where you claimed items were not in the box. I pack these boxes myself and check off each item as i put it in the box so i know 100% that its there. first time it happened it took me a lot of messaging to finally get credit for the item.your answers to messages are painfully slow and not helpful. it just happened again recently and i just didn't have the energy to go through that again but i lost like $6-$7. I lost my job back in april due to covid and going out and finding these items for you is paying the bills and putting food on the table so i take it very seriously and any loss is felt. also it would be nice if your app worked faster and scanned more like decluttrs app. it can tell what the item type is without having to keep switching between cds and dvd and scans much faster.
I really like Eaglesaver.  I was able to get some old CDs off my hand.  I just wish they would accept CDs and DVDs that have a low value like 25cents...etc
Disappointed with actual payment amount. Significantly different than what online quoted price indicated. No detailed email on why a lower payment.

Review.Titre: Perfectly good dvds and covers but was…
Review.Contenu: Perfectly good dvds and covers but was told they weren't satisfactory.  Should have sold on Facebook market place.

Review.Titre: As of today I still have not received…
Review.Contenu: As of today I still have not received my  $41.22 payment that you said was sent in your May 19th email. Please look into this. This is disappointing.
More restrictions than others.   Prices change way to fast.  $20 order level is getting more difficult.Pay well.

Review.Titre: EagleSaver is so easy and quick
Review.Contenu: hello EagleSaver it's almost the end of the year - and i have not received any of the missing checks from you.additionally, i have not received a response from any of my emails to you. we're not discussing (discussing? huh. it's really not much of a discussion, is it?) a substantial amount of money, so this shouldn't be an issue for a company like yours.i'm hoping after much insistence from me, you will respond and resolve this issue.any update, EagleSaver? it's been an additional two months since your post regarding the checks being re-issued, but i still haven't received the checks or any communications.thank you, geoffrey leval============EagleSaver is so easy and quick. Their app couldn't be easier.so far, the biggest problem is getting payment:  out of five packages sent to EagleSaver, i have only received payment for two.  a third is said to be on the way, but i still haven't received it. i'm hoping their responsiveness will get better.
The transaction was swift, however when the check came it didn't reflect the inventory shipped.  An explanation would have been nice.

Review.Titre: The app was slow to use
Review.Contenu: The app was slow to use. If item was to be deleted you were bumped back to the original page. Annoying when trying to scan quickly
Not great turnaround time, and denied one of my submissions, without telling me why. Good pay for what they did take though.

Review.Titre: They said two books were not in the…
Review.Contenu: They said two books were not in the box, but they were packed with everything else.  I will be sure to take pics if I use them again.

Review.Titre: Bad customer service but good company
Review.Contenu: Great company! Horrible customer service. Says they respond in 24 hours but took almost a week to get back.

Review.Titre: The whole process was smooth and easy
Review.Contenu: The whole process was smooth and easy. But the prices offered for the DVDs were extremely low. Sometimes just a few pennies.
Gave ok prices.  But refused the one dvd series I bought brand new at walmart.  Told me it wasn't original?  Um...

Review.Titre: good for selling but not with everything
Review.Contenu: I use EagleSavers for good reasons.  But sometimes the site would not expect items like novels or other graphic novels.
Easy to use , prompt payments, but low prices for CD's and very low pricing for DVD's.

Review.Titre: Pros & Cons - carefully consider the cons! Otherwise, amazing!
Review.Contenu: Pros: The money they quote you really gets paid out very fast. Easy shipping. Amazing customer service (they email you back within the business day which I was pleasantly surprised by how fast it was). Not shady! Legit! :) Very happy about that.Cons: There are all these limitations around what you can donate and how much i.e. the .75 average price per item and the $20 minimum. This should be explicitly detailed right there on the front page. I spent an hour manually entering UPCs and ISBNs only to keep getting rejected due to the .75 average price and $20 minimum requirement. When I asked customer service why this is and that it should be placed on the front page, they gave me some excuse why they couldn't do that. But that just felt like BS to me. They said it's on the FAQs page but it's not explicitly stated there. This was my only friction and hence why I rated it 3 stars instead of 5. Also there's the limitation of the quote expiring in 4 days. I was literally a minute after my expiration date and then they no longer accepted a handful of my items! You can imagine how frustrating that was given what I already stated above.

Review.Titre: Prices are lowing and they take more …
Review.Contenu: Prices are lower than many of their competetors  and they take more than a week after receipt to pay.
My check was sent out jan 30 and it's feb 11..where is my check... Hopefully I get it soon!

Review.Titre: Good place to make Money just a lil…
Review.Contenu: Good place to make Money just a lil slow with processing  and sending you your money
I sold dvd to EagleSaver.  I think that they were worth more than what they paid me.

Review.Contenu: okay, I received a check for my DVD's.
Great experience!

Review.Titre: I don’t think you are very honest I…
Review.Contenu: I don’t think you are very honest I asked to have my dvd’s returned that some had never been opened that you decided not to pay me for after offering me money and you claimed to donate why not give them back as I asked

Review.Titre: I am pretty pleased with the experience…
Review.Contenu: I am pretty pleased with the experience overall. Have several items from the quote returning but that's totally cool. Glad things have gone smoothly.

This is my second time using EagleSaver and the experience was perfect. They communicated right away when they received my packages and paid immediately after. They did exactly as they said they would. I neglected to award five stars only because my first experience was not as great (slow or no communication and delays in receiving payment). I am going to assume that EagleSaver has ironed out those earlier issues based on my second experience, which was terrific. I will use their services again.

Review.Titre: The service was easy to use
Review.Contenu: The service was easy to use.  They communicated well, and they processed the order very quickly.

Prices were very generous for the blu ray DVDs compared to other sites. Scanner didnt work super well but nice to have the manual option. Free shipping is always great. Their process after shipment was less than desirable. Zero communication once the package was delivered. Only received payment when emailed about the status. Otherwise, seamless transaction.
It's nice to trade in no longer useful stuff and get money for it, but my order took over a week after being delivered to be checked thru, so -1 pt.

From Seller side: All was great except after I shipped the order, I never received an email or anything acknowledging shipment or receipt of it. I had to email ES to ask for status after only seeing "awaiting shipment" on my account for 2 weeks. They responded  to my email within 2 days saying they received it and payment was coming (so that was good). So ES just needs to communicate a little better and send an email to sellers when order is received with a payment ETA.

Review.Titre: This transaction went smooth but the last didn’t and previous transactions have also not gone so smoothly!
Review.Contenu: This transaction went smooth. I only sent a few items and there were no deductions. In the past I’ve had severe deductions. For example, my last transaction I sent many DVDS and CDS. The entire transaction was rejected! I spent a lot of time and effort into that (scanning items, cleaning/replacing cases, cleaning discs in a professional machine, packing the items, shipping the box, etc.) only to get a zero return! Not even a reduced or partial offer. I would have been better off using a different buyer who pays a little less but honors their agreement. Next time I will have to explore other buyer options unless you can explain and change my mind? I have been using EagleSaver for a long time now and made many transactions with them. All of my transactions have had price deductions (which obviously didn’t/doesn’t make me happy) but the transactions were processed nonetheless. Can you help?Regards,Gregory Crowley

Review.Titre: Normally I’d give them a 5 out of 5,
Review.Contenu: Normally I’d give them a 5 out of 5,But last few times it took them longer to process an order. Also, I received an email on Sunday saying that within 24 hours I would receive my payment. I just got it today, 3 days later. That’s the first time I’ve had that issue but it was annoying. Beyond that, the site is solid.

Review.Titre: Order went thru but not on time
Review.Contenu: Order went thru but not on time. My package arrived on a Thursday & I didn’t receive any update until the following Wednesday. Still happy with the company though and will send in more stuff soon!

Review.Titre: The process was easy scanning the DVDs…
Review.Contenu: The process was easy scanning the DVDs in but your customer service is horrible I've called multiple times with not one single phone call back that I'm not happy about

Review.Titre: App can be slow but easy process
Review.Contenu: The app can be a bit slow and would go off and on but it does get the job done. The entire process was quite easy. Scan or type in the sku and get a price quote. note if no sku you cannot add just by title. Then add to your sell list or not. I was surprised at some DVDs that had a much higher value than I thought. I finished the process, accepted eagle savers offer, printed out my FedEx label and paperwork. note it was easier to complete my order on my laptop. Boxed up my order and dropped it off at fedex. My only complaint is it took 4 more days to get paid than quoted but that's acceptable. It would be more helpful for the account page to acknowledge receipt of goods when it reaches their warehouse. I would do business with them again.
Very good service, however i feel that the process does have some flaws because how can something I know to have shipped not arrive. I’ve sold like 5k$+ on Eagle save would recommend

They did offer a decent amount for the product I was selling, but I had an issue with the shipment process and EagleSaver wouldn't respond to my numerous voice messages or emails in regards to the issue. I did eventually get my money(after days of frustratingly waiting for a reply), but a follow-up to my concerns with a simple response would have been nice...

Review.Titre: I’m then end, it was as expected
Review.Contenu: The final payment on our order was slightly delayed from the email I initially got but in the end it was as promised.

First the good.  EagleSaver has proven to be an honest and reliable company.  No game playing, no screwing around with reductions for honestly graded items or "Missing items" like companies such as Booksrun are famous.  Payment is prompt.  It is sometimes difficult to  meet their minimum (but far, far easier than D'Clutter, which is near impossible).  However allowing the submitted items a grace period is a HUGE PLUS.   Here  are the three reasons they do not get five stars.  1) The website blows. 2). So does the App.  Both are extremely slow, badly designed and faulty.  If the website does not recognize the ISBN it states you entered the wrong type of item. Yet if you scan with the App, often it will recognize that item. The App might say it is not accepting, yet paste the ISBN into the webpage and it might. 3) No customer service response.  I recently had an item (pre-ISBN) looked up the ISBN and tried to contact EagleSaver.  Wasn't sure they would accept pre-ISBN items.  Three emails over three days and four phone calls (where the answering machine states we will be back to you in 24 hours). No response at all.   Perhaps, it is an operation with limited resources and they cannot upgrade their web and App presence,  maybe they are having trouble retaining adequate staffing.  So I will cut them slack as they have fulfilled everything else with excellence over the past two years.

Update, 12/2023: my last few orders have been processed much faster(consistently 1-2 days) and payment issued at the time of processing.  I am pleased to see these improvements.I give Eagle Saver 4 stars, a composite based on two things.Five stars for item acceptance and price paid.  They pay much better than competing sites, and they refuse very few items.Three stars for service.  Their website says "You will be paid by PayPal or Check within 1 business day of the receipt of your items.".  I am currently on my 7th order with them, and I have *never* been paid in a single day.  The fastest has been at least 2 or 3 business days, at best.  As I write this review, I had a package delivered to them 2 business days ago, and it hasn't been paid.  What's more, their site says they are still waiting for it, which is verifiably untrue.  At least other sites acknowledge receiving your package as soon as they get it, and processing follows.  It always keeps me a bit on edge with the way Eagle Saver does it.   But they have always paid.

Review.Titre: This experience would have been perfect…
Review.Contenu: This experience would have been perfect short of one thing and that is communication. The call center NEVER picks up or calls back. Otherwise a seamless great experience.

Great experience overall. Easy to use website. Only thing that could be better is more realistic estimate of turnaround time to reflect Eaglesaver's requests to FedEx to delay delivery because of whatever impedes delivery.

Review.Titre: All in all an easy process to use
Review.Contenu: All in all an easy process to use to sell CD's.  Prices received are better than the other company I have used.  I would give 5 stars if there were more options to search the database.

This is my first time using EagleSaver.com to recycle unwanted DVD's. I did a head to head price quote comparison on each DVD with one of EagleSavers competitors. I found Eaglesavers's prices to be higher than their competitors almost every time which was great for me, being the seller. I also noticed that EagleSaver was willing to buy a much larger percent of the DVD's I was selling than their competitor. One thing EagleSaver.com does that I think is great, that their competitor does not do, they identify the DVD by title once the UPC number is put into the system or the barcode is scanned, even if they are not offering a price quote to buy it. There are two areas of the EagleSaver.com process that concerned me and are the reason I did not give them five stars. First, their response to my telephonic, and email inquirer's were well outside of the twenty-four hour window they committed to. Secondly, on a couple of occasions they gave me price quotes on DVD's but when I select "Add to cart" I got a message saying "Please contact support team", which I did via telephone message and email. The end result was an email from them three days later telling me they were not accepting that DVD. I am not sure why the DVD was not rejected from the beginning like normal for DVD's they are not buying. The shipping process was free, and the post receipt payment process was expedient, both were as advertised.
Ease of use as well as prepaid shipping. Quick turn around for the monies earned. Kept informed with each step taken as well as condition issues. I did find that the prices paid were on the low end.

Review.Titre: I wish the turnaround were a bit…
Review.Contenu: I wish the turnaround were a bit quicker but I've never had any issues getting paid and will continue to do service with Eagle Saver.

Review.Titre: It took an entire month after sending…
Review.Contenu: It took an entire month after sending the package almost to here from you. Other then that your service was great thank you
Much better prices than decluttr. First experience went well, will use again.
Very good offers.  some problems entering data.  $20 minimum is a little high
Highest prices.  Customer service not so great - but always works out.

Review.Titre: Eaglesaver only takes half the items…
Review.Contenu: Eaglesaver only takes half the items sent in. I'll have to send to other buyers when i have a chance whe more than one buyer accepts the book or cd.

Review.Titre: communication with me phone or email…
Review.Contenu: communication with me phone or email could have been better and the quantity that I sent wasn't exact but all in all your only human and I would do business with you again and recommend you to friends

Review.Titre: Pay well -  Price are better than most
Review.Contenu: Better pricing - they tend to get still as you get to minimum level --- Takes like week

Review.Titre: Improving service dealing with staffing shortages
Review.Contenu: They are trying harder and better, and doing their best with limited staff as of late.

Review.Titre: The system seems to work well
Review.Contenu: The system seems to work well. But unfortunately the customer service is lacking with communication. I would definitely use the company again in the future.

Review.Titre: There's always a good offer plenty of…
Review.Contenu: There's always a good offer plenty of ways to ship free and easy to access website.

Review.Titre: The App is pretty slow and scanning…
Review.Contenu: The App is pretty slow and scanning somewhat difficult. The rest is great!

Review.Titre: Made good on their quotes and payment…
Review.Contenu: Made good on their quotes and payment promises, the entire transaction from free mailing via FedEx of items sold to direct payment into PayPal acct took a little longer than expected, about 10 days in all and unfortunately there is no live phone assistance for questions but confirmation emails were sent thru the processing, FedEx tracking was spot on and most importantly, payment was sent. A few items I sent were rejected for not being up to standard but I sent a large quantity, so the number not taken were minimal and they returned those items as I requested. Overall satisfied with my experience with Eaglesaver and would use again and recommend to others looking for easy to load quotes, "get the camera app", easy and no cost shipping and trustworthy of receiving payment.
I really like your service.  I just wish you would mark the package as received right when it comes in.

Review.Titre: Wish they did t turn down so many and…
Review.Contenu: Wish they did t turn down so many and paid a little better. Other than that they are very easy and quick to work with
They are kind of picky, and there are hoops to jump through, but I got paid and in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Easy system to use...However was hoping…
Review.Contenu: Easy system to use...However was hoping for the prices to be a bit higher
I love Eagle Saver.com.  The amounts could be better but overall the process was very smooth and easy.

Review.Titre: Didn’t take some of my cds but sent…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t take some of my cds but sent them back for free which was nice

Review.Titre: I gave it 4 stars because while I…
Review.Contenu: I gave it 4 stars because while I accept that you couldn't take all of my sent items, I would have preferred you included the title of the items not accepted in the email. The only thing provided was the code, which I couldn't identify with the correct movie etc because I no longer had the movie in my possession. Otherwise I am very happy with my usage of your services, thank you.

Review.Titre: I would have given 5 stars if…
Review.Contenu: I would have given 5 stars if the scanning process was usable. It didn't work most of the time and was frustrating putting in all the numbers using my iPhone. Otherwise, your site was very easy to use and your response was immediate.  I have about 400 more music cd's but they didn't meet your minimum requirements, so I must look elsewhere. Thank you for your speedy response.

Review.Titre: The eaglesaver website was as easy to…
Review.Contenu: The eaglesaver website was as easy to use as one could be.  Payments offered were good compared to other websites.  Sending items was convenient.  Almost all DVD offerings were accepted.  On a more recent use of the website some UPC codes were not recognized as being for the right category (Book, CD, DVD, or Video game).

Eaglesaver.com has met my expectations.  I inherited many CD's and they converted the CD's to cash, so that they would not end up in a landfill and I could use the cash for something else I wanted to purchase.  The procedure was simple, but you never know how a company performs, until there is a problem.  My box of CD's was lost by FedEx and Eagle.com sent me the value of the CD's they quoted after a few emails to them regarding the situation.  I would definitely use this company again.

Review.Titre: I think the overall process for selling…
Review.Contenu: I think the overall process for selling my DVD’s was very good and straightforward, however the barcode scanner was a bit clunky and sometimes unreliable in its ability to properly recognize a barcode.  Having said that, I would still use your services again, and recommend it to others.

Pretty positive experience! They paid for shipping and I received the check about a week or so later.  It would make it much easier if there was a barcode scanner.  The one downfall I had was I didn't see the minimum price they accepted and had already entered quite a few items.  However, the positive was I received a reminder stating my items were not at minimum accepted price.  Overall I would use their service again.

First of all, I was very excited to find a website that would still buy used DVD's.  I had a lot of them and hated to just get rid of them.  It was even better that Eagle Saver bought back the majority of what I had.My only issue was how tedious the process is to enter the barcode.  However, that is really my only complaint.

I really like EagleSaver!  I’ve used multiple sites in the past but this one has been my trusted “go to” for a long time.  The site is easy to use and the payments are issued quickly!The ONLY gripe I have is that sometimes I will send a movie to them in my package, and it showed up on the site, but they will email me to tell me that it’s not valid even though the upc is correct and the disc is in flawless condition.  It doesn’t happen often but it does happen and that can be frustrating.

Review.Titre: Everything was just as stated with just one issue.
Review.Contenu: Everything was just as stated. Response and check issuance was quick and effortless. The only issue that was concerning is several of the DVD's were considered unacceptable according to the guidelines stated. I viewed one of the DVD's "Wuthering Heights" and the picture quality and sound were viewable without interruption of sound or picture quality. The DVD case was in perfect condition also.

Overall great experience, and I really can't complain too much about the prices offered for most items.  (You always wish for more, but for the most part I was satisfied.)My main complaint has to do with the app; it's great that you can scan UPCs from your phone, but the app is very sluggish, and just gets worse as you scan more items.  You can speed things up again by killing and restarting the app, but that really shouldn't be necessary.

After accumulating a "ton" of DVDs, BluRays, and 4Ks, we decided to clear out what we really don't need to see again.  EaglerSaver.com made it easy to evaluate the value and turn almost all of them into cash.  Shipping was easy and the check arrived in a very timely manner.  Highly Recommend!!!

Review.Titre: Eagle Saver has really helped me by…
Review.Contenu: Eagle Saver has really helped me by buying used DVDs or unused for a fair price. After watching a movie a couple of times, as long as I keep it from being scratched I go on the site, enter the DVDs and I know how much the check will be.

Review.Titre: DVDs and CDs yes. Books no.
Review.Contenu: Eagle saver is a great place to sell DVDs and CDs. It is not, however, a good place to sell books. They do not buy textbooks, I get that. But their app will quote you lots of books that they will later say they do not buy. I say don’t give me a buyback price if you won’t buy.

I think they deserve four stars, despite the paltry payments for CDs, and their rejection of many that I can't figure out why.  They are efficient and I needed to get rid of the collection, without a lot of time.

Review.Titre: Takes a long time to get paid
Review.Contenu: Takes a long time to get paid. I sent an email after 7 days of waiting. No response. 3 days later I get an email stating they received my shipment and would be processed. 2 days later I finally receive payment. Be prepared, it takes almost 2 weeks. It's kinda scary you don't get follow up as quickly as you want. But I give them 4 stars because they came through. Guaranteed quite prices and payment in full. Minus one star for lack of response time. I will use again.

Review.Titre: I have in the past sold cds and DVDs I…
Review.Contenu: I have in the past sold cds and DVDs I got my check on time shipping took a little longer than normal I thought  took 6 days to get their  they rejected 3cds for scratches not to big deal they did inform me when my items came that was nice will do business again
Very simple buyback process, and quick payment, too.Would give 5 stars if there wasn't the $.55 cent per item average requirement in addition to the minimum value.

Review.Titre: Overall and incredibly easy way to get…
Review.Contenu: Overall and incredibly easy way to get rid of unused CDs, DVDs and books.  Wish they accepted more titles but I am not too disappointed. Loved the fact that made the process SO EASY!  As long as you have your own boxes laying around, then the shipping is completely free!  They were VERY prompt on payment and it appears I got pretty much the same amount as the estimated quote.  Would definitely use again. Make sure you use the app to scan your items.

Was fairly easy to use, and some of the prices were fair. The scanner is a little tricky, but was well worth the work.  I was consolidating and was happy to get some money for movies that I was getting rid of anyways. Shipping was easy, and the payout was quick.

Review.Titre: Great service but needs bugs fixed.
Review.Contenu: The service is great and the input is good but after 40-50 items the scanner starts slowing down big time. When I get to item 70 its moving at a crawl. And somewhere around 85 items it has deleted my entire list two times already so that's a big that needs to be fixed. I had to send two orders in the same box before because it was freezing so bad at item 50. Please fix this. I have about 400 more DVDs to sell you.

Great concept!  My grandson is saving money for a car and gas money.  This site offers a way to be good to the environment and get paid at the same time.  Thanks for a great service - It couldn't have been easier - we only needed to find a box and our check arrived promptly.  Only one exception - we couldn't get the scanning app to work on our Iphones.  Other than that one thing -- I would offer a 5 star rating...

Over the last few months I have been extremely pleased with selling DVDs to EagleSaver.  In general the prompt payment and free shipping has no equal.  I have only one complaint and that would be the lack of customer support when a question arises.  On numerous occasions I have needed a response and it is very difficult to get feedback in a prompt manner, ether by phone or email.  I will point out that this is my only complaint and overall I am very pleased!

Review.Titre: Wish there was a bar code scanner for…
Review.Contenu: Wish there was a bar code scanner for my I-phone.  Once I figured out how to enter the DVD's into the cart it was great.  Surprised that they offer very little for DVD buy back, but in some cases MUCH More than other sites.  THEY ALSO PAY SHIPPING which was a GREAT Bonus.  I highly recommend them...It sure beats throwing or giving perfectly good DVD's away.

Review.Titre: Quick Pay, Smooth Process but CDs are undervalued.
Review.Contenu: This is a great service for selling music CD's . However, I feel like you get the short end of the stick, because they don't pay much but I'm sure they resell what you sold them for a lot more.  So it's not a win-win.  But it's a way to raise a little cash and free up some space around your house if that's more important to you.

Overall first rate. Sometimes unresponsive to direct questions, but basically I can’t complain. I’ve learned, however, that books are basically value-less to Eagle Saver. In the case of older first editions, that’s surprising to me. So if you’re clearing out page-turners, Half-Price Books remains a much better place to go, even if they often pay minimally.

Review.Titre: My first impression of Eaglesaver has…
Review.Contenu: My first impression of EagleSaver has been great. In fact it was so good that I immediately got a second batch together and sent it right out to them. Everything they say they will do they did and then some. There is only one problem with them and that is when I look up a movie it comes up something else. I have explained to them twice what the problem is and they think it is me inputting the wrong upc number. That's the reason why I can not give them 5 out of 5 stars.

Usually prompt. Not always informative. Pays well for some items but doesn't purchase items you'd think they would. Doesn't buy most cds and hasn't bought a single book out of a hundred even though they advertise that they buy books. It's also weird which dvds they buy and which ones they don't, they are very hit and miss. But their service is usually prompt and accurate. 4 out of 5 stars!

I think they are great I just wish they paid more for items. Most things I scan are 49 cents or less. I understand it’s about demand but some of the stuff is really good and sells on eBay for more than $10. I’m very happy with the turn around time for the stuff I send though.
Easy to use. Wish some DVD titles were over .050 though.Thanks,Marc Zampella

Review.Titre: It took over 2 weeks to get my $$ but I…
Review.Contenu: It took over 2 weeks to get my $$ but I did get full value, some other websites withhold or make up some stories about the condition of the cd's etc. Also had issues logging back in to check on the status of my order. Will probably use again though, maybe it'll be a little faster next time.

I had 3 orders with eaglesaver. Packaged and mailed the DVDs, from arrival to check issuance was less than a week. Got the checks a few days later. Took them to Chase bank who said the checks were bad and couldn’t be cashed or deposited.  Sent an email to eaglesaver, they responded within 24 hours and told me checks are good and try again. I did an online/electronic deposit if the checks via Chase app and they went through ok.

Review.Titre: Eagle Saver is hands down the best…
Review.Contenu: Eagle Saver is hands down the best place to sell media in the internet. But to be fully transparent I do find the process to be a bit frustrating due to site lag when inputting upc’s as well as carts forgetting your history. It can be worked around of course, but some sort of update might be helpful to the customer.Otherwise though, well done!

I enjoyed doing business with eaglesaver. They processed my order very fast and I got my check fast too. The only problem was one set of my Dvd's was not acceptable to them. I was disappointed in this because it was a set that I only watched one time and because of that I thought it would be ok. But I do understand they have a certain standard that must be meant when buying merchandise. I would definitely do business with this company again.

Review.Titre: I was impressed with the site and the…
Review.Contenu: I was impressed with the site and the immediate offer(s) made.  The label printed accurately, as did receipts.  The payment was made, although it took a bit longer to receive than anticipated.  But, due to pandemic and holiday mail, it was understandable.  One drawback was that the help number given out on website was disconnected or no longer in use to answer any inquiries.  This should be corrected.  I am still pleased with the result of my first order of business and have recommended the site to a few friends.Greg BMinnesota

Review.Titre: Sent in a order to this company, received payment within 2 days in paypal .
Review.Contenu: Sent in a order to this company and they were fairly reasonable, although a few items were returned which I did not quite understand because at first it appeared that they were accepted. For this reason I deducted 1 star, overall they are a good company to deal with.

Review.Titre: Communication needs work but reliable and prompt
Review.Contenu: According their FAQs on their site, I was suppose to receive an email when they received my order.  I never received such an email.  Also, I received an email telling me that they had accepted my order and that a check had been mailed, two days after they actually mailed the check.They did, however, pay within one day of processing my order as indicated on their website.   Therefore, I would continue to use them and would recommend them to anyone else who had books, DVDs or CDs to sell.

Review.Titre: The web site only takes the numbers for…
Review.Contenu: The web site only takes the numbers for id, while titles should be able to be input when numbers are not available. Pricing is adequate while receiving the check takes a while. Some things need to be upgraded in order to be a site I would highly recommend to other sellers or buyers

Review.Titre: The process is very quick and fast
Review.Contenu: The process is very quick and fast. While I used the website to enter the UPC numbers, the site did occasionally pick up a wrong title. Maybe it's a database issue but it's 99% accurate. The only drawback I see is they say they'll buy a blu-ray (say for $0.75) but when you go to check out, it won't accept anything less than $1.30 to be shipped back. So why say you'll accept a title when the value is under $1.30?I would still use Eagle Saver again. And yes, I would recommend people to use Eaglesaver to sell blu-rays.

Review.Titre: The only problem I'm having is that…
Review.Contenu: The only problem I'm having is that some of the DVD/Blu-rays I scan in their original cases, come back as Audio CD's or they don't recognize the code !!!!!!!   I've called a number of time and cannot get through.  I've sent a number of emails and receive the same stock response every time.  Although I am satisfied with their service overall, still frustrated with their non response or repeating the stock return email and not actually answering my questions!

In general, I love this site. They return what they can’t buy. But I wish the app would reflect what books they will buy. I says they will buy but when they get it they say not the type they will buy. Please upgrade the app so it does not give a quote if they don’t want it.

Pro: Very quick payment for the DVD's and Blue-Ray's that we sold them! Also easy free shipping to get our stuff to them.Cons: Website took forever to load each barcode and show an offer, and on a computer you have to load them one at a time and wait between each one.Also, and prob not their fault, but the offers for the DVD's was pretty low- I think a few were $.25 for brand new sealed Blue-Ray's depending on the movie, but you can find Blue-Ray's at the Dollar Store now, so I suppose that's a fair price. As I continue to clean out the house, I will likely use them again when I find more movies.

Review.Titre: Easy App/Process, wish for a bit more titles
Review.Contenu: Easy interface, scanning app to use.  Scanning was occasionally a bit clunky for a few items, but overall worked decently.  Would have liked if they accepted a few more titles but understand their business model allows for certain things/types.  Shipping is a breeze - appreciated that aspect.

Need better instructions/directions on how to transfer/ enter UPC codes. It took me a while to figure it out. Still trying to figure out how to enter more than one UPC code at a time.Otherwise instructions were clear for packaging and shipping. I received my payment in a timely manner

Review.Titre: The site and app are great
Review.Contenu: The site and app are great, Free shipping to send items is amazing; the only complaint I have is that they are very picky with items and make a big deal out of very small things to not buy items then they ask if you want to recycle items with them( I suspect they keep and sell without paying for them).

Review.Titre: This has been a slow process
Review.Contenu: This has been a slow process, however, given the current environment, I understand. It is an easy process and amount I was told I would receive is fair.  I was told my check payment was processed a week ago and I still have not received it.  Please respond and give me a status.

Very good buyer! They give the best price if you want to sell your cd-dvd and books! They supplies the fedex label so very easy! When it gets delivered could take a bit of time to review and make the payment! I wish it would get paid faster but overall it’s a very safe and good place to sell!!

Review.Titre: Great way to get cash for books
Review.Contenu: Great way to get cash for books, games, video games, textbooks.Excellent description, listings, and turnaround time for a check to be sent and delivered.Would prefer another way to send it instead of the post office or Fedex. Fedex not readily available in my area. Would prefer UPS.

My experience with EagleSaver was positive. I was a little angry when I received my first check from my first order, but I do understand that they have certain rules and guidelines, and that they expect the customer to know those rules and guidelines if they want to do business with them.  One thing I do appreciate is that in the email they sent me, they explained why I was not being compensated for certain items, and that I would be receiving those items back at no charge to me. That was great to hear. I did receive my rejected items back in a timely manner.Yes. I will do business with them again. The process was an easy one.Thanks,I. Robertson

Review.Titre: I was a little surprised to NOT receive…
Review.Contenu: I was a little surprised to NOT receive the full value of the receipt for the DVDs due to what EagleSaver had claimed were "scratches" in the DVDS; however, EagleSaver was prompt in sending me a check for most of the amount promised. Also, shipping to them was free on my end.

I have sold used CDs and DVDs to EagleSaver.com on three occasions starting in August 2019.  It is easy to obtain prices using the UPCs. It is extremely easy and convenient to print the prepaid label and drop y package at a Federal Express location.  For all three shipments to them, EagleSaver.com has accepted everything I have shipped (I do keep my items in pristine condition) and sent me a check for precisely the amount indicated.  I would like their site even more if there were a way to offer to sell legitimate imported CDs (not bootlegs) that bear no UPC.

12/27/2020I would like to give 5 STARS! but I have not received my payment yet. Please read below:Order Date: 12/06/20Hi HARUO SHIGA,We have received your order and payment will be issued within 24 hours.Please confirm that your address, E-mail and payment preference is correct.(note: please respond to this email only if edits need to be made).You may view a comprehensive accounting of this Order by logging into your account. If you have any questions, please go to our Help Center or Contact Us. We appreciate your business.EagleSaver.comOrder InformationOrder Number: 1124226Name: HARUO SHIGA

Review.Titre: I was surprised to discover a website…
Review.Contenu: I was surprised to discover a website such as this. The company gives fairly decent prices for DVDs. They pay for the shipping of the movies. Overall the experience went well. The only complaint I have is that Fedex stated they delivered the package. Eaglesaver failed to update the system to reflect the package was received. I believe it was five days after the actual delivery date the company stated they were in possession of the goods. Also, Eaglesaver did not meet the target date. Just as the acceptance being behind, the mailing of payment was as well. The company did mail the payment as promised.

Review.Titre: Placing an order was very easy
Review.Contenu: Placing an order was very easy. Instructions were clear and scanning items made price check faster. Notification emails let you knowstatus of orders. I will definitely use site for future sales.

Review.Titre: Love that there is a site out there…
Review.Contenu: Love that there is a site out there that will buy old DVDs and Blu Rays.  Just wish that they would either drop the minimum average of $0.75 or offer more per disc.    $0.21 and $0.37 for most items....come on....   all in all great site and will use again.

This would be a 5* review, but it would only give me the option of shipping via FedEx and there aren't a ton of FedEx shipping locations close. The closest one has so many restrictions on what, how and how much you ship that I don't even try anymore.

Review.Titre: This was a great way to clean out some…
Review.Contenu: This was a great way to clean out some old games and movies. Very impressed with how quickly my items were evaluated and payment received. Yeah, a handful of stuff was rejected, but not bad really. Would definitely make this my first choice to sell my used media!

Review.Titre: Mostly good service but some weird rules that frustrated me
Review.Contenu: It wasn't until I was checking out to sell that I was told that my cart had to have an average of 1$ for my stuff to be able to sell. Not sure why that is, nothing explained why that was necessary and I've never experienced that with any other service I've ever used. Then when my stuff arrived, they changed the values on things so I got less that what it quoted me at, again with no explanation of why. However, they are the only service I've used that is nice enough to return things that they won't accept. Overall, mostly a good service but some of their rules were frustrating and without reason.

Review.Titre: Very happy except for the reasons they…
